About

Throughout the years I fiddled around with a lot of different things. I always try to not only focus on one thing but rather on putting something in context and combining different elements.

Projects

Arch Linux Rice

After using Arch Linux for almost two years I settled on this install using it on all my machines nowadays. It is very basic but nonetheless has all necessary features.

GitHub

Arduino Weather Station

Small weather station I am currently developing with a NodeMCU. It will send weather data to a websocket. On the website there will be some nice graphs hopefully.
